content.description:
Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following question(s) refer to the following possible relationships between organisms in an ecosystem.

(A) Commensalism

(B) Parasitism

(C) Mutualism

(D) Predation

(E) Competition
content.question: Exemplified by moss growing on a tree trunk in a forest

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
